BREAKTHROUGH STORIES

  • "We stand for innovation... CES is well known as the world's foremost innovation event and we're happy to have selected a domain name on .TECH that conveys what we stand for in a succinct way."

    Jeff Joseph - SVP of Communications

  • "What is better than HOLLYWOOD.TECH...for a website that brings together two vastly successful giants of our modern world: Hollywood and Technology! The name is concise yet descriptive, and just perfect for my business debut in the tech sector."

    Sheeraz Hasan - Marketing Visionary

  • "We wanted to shorten our name... we liked stronger but wanted people to know that we're in technology. Our name became: STRONGER.TECH. Short, Powerful, and conveyed what we do and what industry we are in. We get lots of questions and compliments on it."

    Heather Stratford - CEO, Stronger International
